plot: In this parody of detective and gangster films two veteran detectives who were former policemen get involve in mafia world. One of them gets the job from mafia boss to follow his suspicious wife
title: Dovidjenja u Cikagu
plot_es: In this parody of detective and gangster films two veteran detectives who were former policemen get involve in mafia world. One of them gets the job from mafia boss to follow his suspicious wife
